thread.title: GEG Manager Selected a Top 100 Finalist in the 2015 Chicago Innovation Awards
thread.title_full: GEG Manager Selected a Top 100 Finalist in the 2015 Chicago Innovation Awards

title: GEG Manager Selected a Top 100 Finalist in the 2015 Chicago Innovation Awards
text:
September 17, 2015 16:08 ET GEG Manager Selected a Top 100 Finalist in the 2015 Chicago Innovation Awards 
Innovative Real Estate Tool Recognized for Meeting Needs of Real Estate Investors 
CHICAGO, IL--(Marketwired - Sep 17, 2015) - Growth Equity Group , a leading Chicago-based real estate company focused on helping individual investors enter the real estate investment market, today announced that the group's GEGManager.com (GEG Manager) platform was selected as a top 100 finalist for the 2015 Chicago Innovation Awards. 
As the largest annual celebration of innovation in the Midwest, the Chicago innovation Awards recognizes new products and services fostering growth and advancement across all industries in the Chicago region. GEG Manager is a revolutionary online investment management tool that enables users to manage their real estate investments in real time. Designed to help preserve, protect and enhance the owner's investment, GEG Manager not only increases the transparency of real estate investments, but enables investors to drive profits by making smarter decisions while maintaining compliance with IRS rules. 
"GEG Manager is an innovative platform that enables users to easily understand how their investments are generating cash flow and take action to improve cash flow, all in real time," said Brett Immel, Senior Partner and Co-founder of Growth Equity Group. "We are proud to be a finalist in the prestigious 2015 Chicago Innovation Awards, in the company of so many inspirational and ambitious individuals." 
As a top 100 finalist, Growth Equity Group is also eligible for the People's Choice Award, a recognition bestowed by popular vote. Individuals can vote online at www.chicagoinnovationawards.com/2015-peoples-choice-award/ . Chicagoans are also invited to attend the Chicago Innovation Awards Ceremony on October 27 to celebrate innovative products and services like GEG Manager and honor the creative spirit of the Chicago region. Tickets for the event are available via http://www.eventbrite.com/e/14th-annual-chicago-innovation-awards-registration-18534305607 . 
To explore GEG Manager, visit http://gegmanager.com/ . 
About Growth Equity Group Growth Equity Group is a real estate company specializing in residential income-producing investment properties for individuals. Growth Equity Group makes investing in real estate easy by offering inventory, non-recourse financing and management services. Headquartered in Chicago, Illinois Growth Equity Group is backed by more than 25 years of experience and over $150MM in residential real estate transactions. By leveraging expertise, resources and relationships, GEG pushes the traditional market approach to provide superior market analysis. For more information, please visit www.growthequitygroup.com . Contact Information
